author: Andrew Walters
comment: Purchased this a wile ago when I had my older not so nice not 360 with no features and terrible screen resolution and it worked fine now that I have a much nicer newer lg urbane 2nd edition that is superior to the Moto 360 in every way I cannot change any settings on this watch face same issue that other user had unable to change any settings very frustrating because I love the look of this watch face

author: Eric Emberson
comment: No matter what I do to change look of face, nothing happens on Tag Heuer watch.
title: Cannot change look

author: Linda Phipps
comment: My watch face does not look like depicted. The gears don't show around bezel. Only at the top. I want the one shown. Help please

author: Doug Kimmel
comment: Very nice faces that are customizable.  Face is very busy until you get used to it. All in all a very nice watch face.
title: Very nice face

author: Warren Buddin
comment: Fantastic live watch face for the Moto 360.

author: Neil Westfield
comment: Fantastic face. Looks great on my watch!
title: Awesome!

author: Leonard Price
comment: I was pleased with the design of the watchface, but on a moto 360, it causes the battery to drain significantly

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Edit: This issue has been resolved! Great working with you Leonard.
Please send us a screen shot of your watch battery stats via scoondesign@gmail.com.
You can access this by: 
1.navigating to android wear (app) on your phone
2.clicking on the gear on the top right
3.clicking on "watch battery"

title: problems

author: Randy Brooks
comment: Truly beautiful and clean implementation. Always love the level of customization. Scoon is the best watch crafter in the Play Store.
title: Best yet

author: Megan Hammond
comment: Whoa...I wanted to customize it to one of the dark minimalist views. I changed the settings, but the watch face kept crashing on my Smartwatch 3. Tried restarting and starting over a few times before refunding. Just kept crashing and reverting to default everything. Was burning through battery as I tried to change the settings on phone or watch, watch started to get warm.

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Hi Megan,
Please contact us at scoondesign@gmail.com. We'd love to troubleshoot any issues you are having.

author: adrian simental
comment: I purchased this watch face and I couldn't change a thing except colors.  Really dissapointing and its full of glitches.  Not compatible with the Huawei watch

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content: Please contact us at ScoonDesign@gmail.com, we've recently updated for compatibility with higher resolution watches like the Huawei Watch.

title: What?
